contents.label: section-title
contents.text: Q. What changes should l expect to see in Banner 9 for Finance?

contents.label: section-title
contents.text: Q. What is the context behind the upgrade timeframe? Can this be pushed out?

contents.label: section-title
contents.text: Q. What happens if we can't upgrade to Banner 9 in time? What are the risks?

contents.label: section-title
contents.text: Q. What are the regulatory risks / timeline I need to consider?

contents.label: section-title
contents.text: Q. Who else has moved forward with the Banner 9 upgrade?

contents.label: section-title
contents.text: Q. What do I need to consider if our institution has modifications?

contents.label: section-title
contents.text: Q. Do we need Services to complete the upgrade to Banner 9?

contents.label: section-title
contents.text: Q. What training or re-training of staff will be needed to use the new system?
